senses.sense_definition: Страдательное причастие настоящего времени от глагола <w>раздаивать</w>.

examples.text: Правильно <w>раздаиваемая</w> корова быстро восстановила свои прежние удои.

target_lang_translations.en: The cow, being properly <w>milked to increase yield</w>, quickly restored her previous milk yields.

examples.text: Эта <w>раздаиваемая</w> коза требует много терпения и ласки от доярки.

target_lang_translations.en: This goat, being <w>stimulated for milk production</w>, requires a lot of patience and affection from the milkmaid.

target_lang_definitions.en: Present passive participle of the verb 'to milk to increase yield'; describing an animal undergoing a specific milking regimen to stimulate or restore milk production.

en.target_lang_sense_clarification: describing the process of stimulating milk flow
